Learn English vocabulary faster with your native language. Every word, definition, and sentence is translated into your language by a set of professional native speakers. Spanish is the first language to be part of this feature, and many more languages are on the way.
Hi, your 7 days trial has ended. You can still use this app and enjoy most of its functions. However, if you want an ad-free experience and dark mode please consider upgrading. Thank you :)
Stay free of ads and save your eyes and battery with dark mode for a small one-time price.
Thank you for your purchase. Your contribution will help us create a better app :)
